Li Xin Stephen 李鑫

Assistant Professor

The Education University of Hong Kong
Department of Mathematics and Information Technology

Research Interests:
Data Science and Business Analytics
Mathematics Modeling and Optimization
Computing and Intelligent Algorithms
Machine Learning for Combinatorial Optimization

Email: stephenli@eduhk.hk
More details on RICH

I am an Assistant Professor at the Department of Mathematics and Information Technology, The Education University of Hong Kong (EdUHK).Before joining EdUHK, I served as an Associate Professor (tenured) at the College of Management, Shenzhen University. I obtained my Ph.D. degree from City University of Hong Kong (CityUHK), following a master’s degree from Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU) and a bachelor’s degree from Huazhong University of Science and Technology (HUST).

My research interests focus on data science, business analytics, and intelligent optimization algorithms, with particular emphasis on mathematical modeling for complex systems and machine learning applications in combinatorial optimization. I have developed innovative scheduling algorithms for healthcare systems, manufacturing processes, and logistics operations. My work has been published in top-tier journals including Omega, Information Sciences, IEEE Transactions on Automation Science and Engineering, and Artificial Intelligence in Medicine.

I am actively seeking motivated Ph.D. students, research assistants, and visiting scholars to join my research group. Prospective students with backgrounds in mathematics, computer science, or education technology are especially encouraged to apply. Interested candidates may contact me via email with CV and research interests. Due to the volume of inquiries, I may not be able to respond to all messages individually, but I carefully review each application.
